title: Miss Fortune just chunked 40% of my support's health with Double Up

replies.body: Double up after bouncing does way too much damage is ridiculous

Yeah, she's really strong as a lane bully at the moment.  She was usually considered a big lane bully too but it got a lot stronger with her new passive.  She trades for that with her low range with AA and no escape abilities so that it is hard for her to kite effectively.  Hench, she is a wombo combo queen instead.  In late game she really needs to hit a good ult or she is a pretty easy target to capture.   Still, I agree that the damage is too high on her Q during the early phases of the game at the moment.

How many double ups did she land? were they bounced on a minion first that died with the Q? Mf has poking early, but her constant/duel potential has actually been nerfed with low ad and low ad scaling. Her power now comes from quick trades/pokes and her ult. I think she is pretty balanced.

If losing 40% of your health for trying to CS is balanced, then sure.
Or watching her support press a button, then getting hit by an unavoidable slow in the middle of her ult. That's pretty balanced, too.

The bounce of Double Up with a BF Sword + passive hits for almost 600.

To be able to do that, MF needs the minion to be close to death+your position to be within the skill's cone so.....You're just playing to HER strengths, and if you're under turret and she's not getting ganked it's bad decision making. Besides, if you give her a weak laning phase she'll just be stomped by everyone else like she was before the reworks. It's very difficult to access Love Tap's damage after you start roaming unless people are dumb enough to come in pairs and get kited to death. and She can't weave double ups betweeen her AAs once she gets Attack speed because it lowers her DPS

This is like complaning that Graves slaughters you at melee range, with OR without items. Or that Caitlyn won't let you farm because she has a gazillion traps between the minions and yourself.
and that valor is a taxi driver now with a pretty ct blind (next patch)

This is pretty common, especially after Miss Fortune gets a BF sword. I think her poking was buffed after Love Tap applies to her Q. I've been able to chunk around 60% of an ADC's health with nothing but a BF sword even in Ranked.

MF is super, super, super overtuned honestly.

Laning monster that transitions into a team wiper with a decent MF ult. How can that design possibly be balanced?

Her ult is iconic, but to me her laning prowess is what I like about her. Both can't be broken though or she's simply just too easy to play.

i think they needed to give her a bad laning phase, and buff hard her ulti and her E to make her the aoe damage adc

I disagree with that idea. I think her ult needs to be toned down and she should remain a lane bully (though her early damage is a bit too much right now because of the new passive) Her ult has a lot of damage, yes, but she is a sitting duck when she uses it. It's not just that shes squishy but almost anything can stop the channel of it.

The problem with your situation is that your support had to be in a bad position to allow MF to bounce an Empowered Q onto them.  Your support had to be basically directly behind a near dead minion in line with Miss Fortune.  

MF's probably the most position oriented/punished ADC in the game atm, due to her Q Bounce, Ult channel, and lack of ANY escape mechanism.  She's punished for her bad positioning, and rewarded for bad enemy positioning.  

That's a completely balanced situation.
I've seen a lot of qq on the boards but to whine about a skill that wasn't even changed is....
Was the support the first thing she hit? Her new passive causes bonus damage each time she hits a different target so...
She's literally just ulting us under our tower and chunking 80% of our health. Like, what the fuck? How is this okay?
